item.title: No Surprise: ‘The View’ Has No Clue About Why Parents Love School Choice
item.description: In a heated exchange with co-host Alyssa Farah Griffin, Sunny Hostin made two patently false statements about school voucher programs.

item.title: ‘The Judges Know It’s A Political Thing’: Michigan Court Pauses Peaceful Pro-Lifers’ Sentencing Until Trump Admin Starts
item.description: Hope was sparked this week that Trump could quell the zeal of the DOJ that has been actively pursuing pro-lifers in recent years.

item.title: Sen. Joni Ernst Highlights Nine Examples Of Washington Waste In ‘Caturday’ Campaign
item.description: Ernst highlighted nine examples in her social media campaign that illustrate how the federal government blows through taxpayer money.
